entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hi, everyone! Welcome to my first blog post!
entry.content:
Hi, everyone! Welcome to my first blog post!

I am a Backend engineer for a mix of serverless and traditional architectures with over 4 years of experience and a focus on real-time and scalable systems. Graduated from National Institute Of Technology, Delhi in Computer Science and Engineering. Experience in building big data systems, fintech solutions and domain driven design.

In my four years in this industry, I've honed my analytical thinking and collaboration skills, and I love working with a team. I believe that in the achievement of my teamâ€™s and personal goals lies the greatest opportunity for my organization to grow fast.

Skills: Python, NodeJs, Apache Spark, Elasticsearch, Mongo, SQL, Machine learning, Javascript, Kafka, Kubernetes, AWS technologies, MEAN/MERN stack, Docker

Interests: Big Data, Blockchain, Machine learning, Algorithms

Contact me at karanjeet96@gmail.com for general inquiries, collaborations, jobs, etc.

Thank you for reading !
